result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J Millard Sr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Apply 7 days sentence credit, if revoked.

miscConds.notes: Cash bail applied to Court costs and DNA surcharge - PAID IN FULL.

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
No contact with the victims or their residences and no violent contact with Jessica M.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

records.addlTxt: Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Attorney Wolff.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Christopher J Millard in court with attorney Peter M Wolff.  Mary Caitlin Brejcha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant enters a plea of guilty to the charge. Court conducted plea colloquy with defendant.
Court found defendant guilty.   

The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

TERM OF PROBATION:  12 MONTHS; WITHHELD; 7 DAYS CREDIT IF REVOKED.

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
*Absolute Sobriety; 
*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
*No contact with:  victims or their residences and no violent contact with Jessica M.
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.

DNA SURCHARGE: $200.00 - Apply cash bail from this case and from 15CM1804.

COURT COSTS:  $253.00 (includes $10.00 DRGOD assessment) - apply cash bail
